Engineer Software Architect ChatDesk March 2016 to Present 1 I designed architected and oversaw the implementation of key products that helped our company to attract funding and grow 2 I lead a team reliable software solutions that met clients needs 2 I designed and built a document management system that client used to control the life cycle of documents within their organization thereby increasing their workflow efficiency and accountability 3 I designed and built an electronic health records system from scratch and sold it to hospitals It helped clients improve their services for of the user interface for a payroll management system which was deployed for a government organization 2 I participated in the creation of easytounderstand documentation for end users of the system 3
